## Slide with Plotly

```{r plotly_lib, include=FALSE}
library(plotly,  quietly = TRUE)
```

```{r plot}

plot_ly(x = mtcars$wt, y = mtcars$cyl, 
        z = mtcars$mpg, type = "scatter3d", mode = "markers", 
        color = mtcars$wt )
```
